name: io.github.ark-forge/mcp-eu-ai-act
description: MCP Server for EU AI Act & GDPR Compliance Checking. Scans codebases for 16 AI frameworks, checks compliance across risk categories, generates reports and documentation templates.

environmentVariables.description: Optional: ArkForge API key for Pro features (>10 scans/day). Free tier requires no API key.
environmentVariables.name: ARKFORGE_API_KEY
